response.overview: Park Seong‑ah (Cho Yi‑hyun) is a high school student by day and a secret shamaness—known as Fairy Cheon Ji—by night. She possesses supernatural abilities that let her foresee dire fate. One evening, she encounters Bae Gyeon‑woo (Choo Young‑woo), a new transfer student, and has a haunting vision that he’s destined to die soon. Determined to rewrite his fate, she pledges to protect him—mixing high‑school drama, romance, and mystical suspense as she fights to save him and balance her dual life.
response.title: 견우와 선녀 - Head Over Heels
